reviewDescription: Arrived early Perfect fit Door swing the wrong way ! Thry should have known Ha Ha That was a joke !
Was damaged on arrival. Was promised 120 dollars refund, ... they refunded me $120, Amazon gave me $100 credit on qualifying items. They Stand by their word, good quality refrigerator.

reviewTitle: Excellent appliance for the family apartment.
reviewDescription: Happy with the quality and price.
Needed a refrigerator for office staff,the size Needed to be perfect
